resources.string: A group of renegade robots have escaped from the robot factory! They are hiding behind grey blocks! It falls to you, the player, to guess where they are hiding so that they can be brought back to the factory.
Congratulations! You have found all the robots!
This project was made by Junho Sung as part of assignment from CMPT 276 taught by Dr.Brian Fraser. Link to class website: http://www.cs.sfu.ca/CourseCentral/276/bfraser/index.html.

Links to images used in project: http://www.cs.sfu.ca/CourseCentral/276/bfraser/solutions/images/ImageGallery/content/shutterstock_58508720_large.html. http://www.cs.sfu.ca/CourseCentral/276/bfraser/solutions/images/ImageGallery/content/shutterstock_76677952_large.html
